task.summary: Now builds with Gradle. Fixed some build errors. Reformatted to modified Google style. Some progress on porting BasicStroke code.
Now builds with Gradle. Fixed some build errors. Reformatted to modified Google style. Some progress on porting BasicStroke code.
Fix a severe bug where Choice wouldn't work at all. Eliminate NullWidgetSupplier.
Partial fix for new-API issues. Increase minimum API to 16.
Fix most new-API issues. SkinJobGraphicsEnvironment now uses headless environment in older APIs if the Android context doesn't extend Activity.
The Context can no longer be stored in SkinJobGlobals, because Android Lint says this is a memory leak.
Update Gradle Android plugin version (required by Travis).
Update Gradle Android plugin version (required by Travis).
Update Gradle Android plugin version from 2.2.0 to 2.2.2 (recommended by Android Studio),
Update Gradle Android plugin version from 2.2.0 to 2.2.2 (recommended by Android Studio),

MESSAGE.value: Now builds with Gradle. Fixed some build errors. Reformatted to modified Google style. Some progress on porting BasicStroke code.
Fix a severe bug where Choice wouldn't work at all. Eliminate NullWidgetSupplier.
Partial fix for new-API issues. Increase minimum API to 16.
Fix most new-API issues. SkinJobGraphicsEnvironment now uses headless environment in older APIs if the Android context doesn't extend Activity.
The Context can no longer be stored in SkinJobGlobals, because Android Lint says this is a memory leak.
Update Gradle Android plugin version (required by Travis).
Update Gradle Android plugin version from 2.2.0 to 2.2.2 (recommended by Android Studio),
